dt-example.title: Buttons integration
dt-example.info:
The Buttons extension for DataTables provides a framework for buttons and manipulate and uses the DataTable's data. This includes exporting of files, as demonstrated in this example.
The `-init layout` option is used to position the Buttons and SearchPane control around the table.
